title: Strengthening Practical App Development Competencies: Inquiry-Based Mathematics Instructional Design and Scientific Evaluation Capability

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and inquiry-based learning experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design inquiry-based mathematical problem-solving scenarios in three or more stages (problem definition → hypothesis formulation → verification)
Learners can provide peer feedback on inquiry processes by applying scientific competency evaluation criteria (observation, inference, experimental design, etc.)
Learners can improve their inquiry scenarios at least twice based on formative assessment results and finalize deliverables
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
